title: Provided that, if the plot is reserved for some public purpose with plus (+) sign, then at least 50% of the plot area shall be developed for the purpose for which it is reserved in DP and rest of the plot can be developed for other purposes related to plus (+) sign considering the deficiency in that ward
clause_text: Provided that, if the plot is reserved for some public purpose with plus (+) sign, then at least 50% of the plot area shall be developed for the purpose for which it is reserved in DP and rest of the plot can be developed for other purposes related to plus (+) sign considering the deficiency in that ward.
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:
